Dear Bernardina

I sent Casaca to write to you on my behalf from here, but I have decided to take him with me.

Send me by Vicente 2 pieces of yellow cloth. Best regards to all our people and hugs to our children. Rest assured, I am not traveling to Rio, and I will soon follow to the Assembly; goodbye, see you soon.

Yours: (a) Almeida.
